content: The Google Nest Hub Max redefines smart home living. It has a great 10-inch display.
The Google Nest Hub Max seems to have great functionality.
The Nest Hub functionality is very nice to have.
The Nest Hub functionality is very nice to have, as other have said.
The Nest Hub Max offers better sound quality. The screen is bigger and the camera is great with many features.
The Nest Hub Max's built-in camera works as a Nest camera. This is a really useful feature.

If you want cameras inside then the hub max is best. It has great features.
The Nest Hub Max has an always-on camera that tracks people. I think that this might be a breach of privacy.
The Nest Hub Max has an always-on camera that tracks people. I find that concerning.
The Google Nest Hub and Google Nest Hub Max are pretty easy to set up. It supports customization for six users.
If you get the Google home max it has a built in Nest security camera which is very useful.
If you get the Google home max it has a built in Nest security camera. This is a selling point for me.

The devices work spectacularly and have great integration across the Google Home ecosystem.
I can confirm the Hub Max doesn't have night vision, even with an IR light.
I use a screen protector tempered glass on my Google Hub Max, and it's easier to clean.
